entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
